mapper.sql: SELECT qnaseq, id, regdate, content, title, checks FROM qna
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qnaseq, id, regdate, content, title, checks, recontent, reregdate, remark, image) values(qna_seq.nextval, #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '미답변', #{recontent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reregdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
